title: "Study says Abbott’s HeartMate3 heart pump extends survival by 5 years"
excerpt: "Abbott (NYSE:ABT) announced today that data demonstrates extended survival for advanced heart failure patients using HeartMate 3. Data from the Momentum 3 trial — the world’s largest randomized clinical trial to assess long-term outcomes in people receiving a left ventricular assist device (also known as an LVAD or heart pump) to treat advanced heart failure"
